author: Amarnath Tewary
text:
BJP dares Nitish Kumar to get them arrested

The ruling Janata Dal (United) on Tuesday suspended two party legislators and served show-cause notices on them for their “controversial” statements. The suspended legislators are Gopalpur MLA Neeraj Kumar Mandal alias Gopal Mandal and party MLC from Samastipur Rana Gangeshwar Singh.

On Sunday, Mr. Mandal said he was earlier doing “politics of murder” and, if provoked, would do it again. “ Main pehle hatya ki rajniti karta tha aur ab phir se hatya ki rajniti karunga aur karwaunga ,” said Mr. Mandal at the inaugural ceremony of a ‘kavi sammelan’ (poets congregation) in Naugacchia of Bhagalpur. He declared that he had enough arms and ammunition to protect his people.

Mr. Gangeshwar Singh embarrassed the party while addressing a gathering on Tuesday on the occasion of Bihar Diwas. He put a question mark on the authenticity of the national anthem. “Our national anthem needs to be changed as it appears to praise those who ruled he country,” he said.
title: 2 JD(U) legislators suspended for embarrassing party
